page.description: Enumerate all open tables in the current session.
page.original:
TABLE.ENUM_SESSION_OPEN() Syntax Table_List as C = TABLE.ENUM_SESSION_OPEN( [ Format as C ] ) ArgumentDescription Table_ListA character string containing information about open tables. FormatOptional.
"N" = Table name.
"F" = Path and filename.
"S" = Handle
Description The TABLE.ENUM_OPEN() method returns a character string containing information about tables open in the current session. Examples ? table.enum_session_open("F"+crlf()) = C:\PROGRAM FILES\A5V6\NULL.DBF C:\DATABASES\ALPHASPORTS\CUSTOMER.DBF
See Also Table Functions and Methods, TABLE.ENUM_OPEN()
